title: I suddenly can't play draft but I'm level 10???
body: Yesterday, I was able to play draft all day. Now today I suddenly am not allowed too? I'm exactly lvl 10?

replies.body:
Same exact thing happened to me. Could play draft a few days ago, and now suddenly I can't. It has nothing to do with the minimum champ requirement (only had 13 total before and now, including free, no overlap). 

SO I'm guessing it's just some sort of bug that let us play before we should've been allowed? It's quite a mystery.

I believe you need to have 15 champions available including the free champion rotation in order to play draft.  It looks like your total should bring you enough now to do draft pick.  Is this still an issue?
My issue fixed once i bought 2 more champions.  But it was odd cause when I first hit lvl 10, I could play draft normally.
